title: MED Vol.80, No.89
content:
Advertisers are placing more restrictions on their partners when it comes to AI in their work. (ad-age)

Lawmakers set sights on data minimization as states seek to limit companies from capturing vast amounts of personal info (the record)

Richard Serra, Who Recast Sculpture on a Massive Scale, Dies at 85 (nyt, r.smith)

Ray Kurzweil | SXSW 2024 (youtube)

“we decided that our best course of action is to just never have our users’ private data.”  (sean coats)

Anyone want to pay an extra 50% for their Spotify subscription? This bill would make it mandatory.  (p.kafka bus. insider)

Transformed by AI: How generative artificial intelligence could affect work in the UK – and how to manage it (ippr.org)

FTC Proposes Strengthening Children’s Privacy Rule  (jdsupra.com).

Vapi – Voice AI for any application; Voice-to-Voice Demo • Hume AI
author: MDG
